possible_causes: Main board and sub-board communication failure
Signal frame loss due to electromagnetic interference
recommendations: Check signal cable connection in the control cabinet
Use a multimeter to test voltage on the communication line
Re-plug connectors and restart the system

possible_causes: Foreign object stuck in door track
No signal received by controller from door sensor
recommendations: Check for obstructions in the door track
Manually close the door and observe sensor light
Inspect sensor alignment and cable connections
